thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I had a great experience with Intoxalock. Jackie helped me out tremendously in providing all of the necessary information needed in order to get the device installed and ready to go. She was very, very nice and helped me in every way that she could, as fast as possible. I am very pleased with my service and would highly recommend Intoxalock to anyone in need of an ignition interlock device.
